name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities apply Ratfang Toxin to your target, stacking up to 5 times.
Use: Release all toxin stacks to deal 594,747 Nature damage, plus 67,971 per stack over 5 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Taking damage has a high chance to brand your assailant dealing 87,301 Holy Fire damage and healing you for 50% of damage dealt.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
